verses.verse: For freedom <S%G1657><s%> did <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> set <S%G1659><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> free <S%G1657><s%>: stand fast <S%G4739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G1758><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> entangled <S%G1758><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> in a yoke <S%G2218><s%> of bondage <S%G1397><s%>.

Behold <S%G1492><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> ye receive circumcision <S%G4059><s%>, Christ <S%G5547><s%> will profit <S%G5623><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

Yea <S%G1161><s%>, I testify <S%G3143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that receiveth circumcision <S%G4059><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a debtor <S%G3781><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3551><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> law <S%G3551><s%>.

Ye are severed <S%G2673><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, ye <S%G2673><s%> who would <S%G3748><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>; ye are fallen away from <S%G1601><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> through the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> wait for <S%G553><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> availeth <S%G2480><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> working <S%G1754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%>.
Ye were running <S%G5143><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>; who <S%G5101><s%> hindered <S%G348><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> that ye should <S%G3982><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> the truth <S%G1465><s%>?
This <S%G3588><s%> persuasion <S%G3988><s%> came not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him that <S%G3588><s%> calleth <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.
A little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leaveneth <S%G2220><s%> the <S%G5445><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> have confidence <S%G3982><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you-ward <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> ye will be <S%G5426><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> otherwise <S%G243><s%> minded <S%G5426><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> troubleth <S%G5015><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> shall bear <S%G941><s%> his <S%G3588><s%> judgment <S%G3748><s%>, whosoever <S%G302><s%> he be <S%G5600><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G2784><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> am I <S%G1377><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%>? then <S%G686><s%> hath <S%G2673><s%> the stumbling-block <S%G4625><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> been done away <S%G2673><s%>.
I would <S%G3785><s%> that they that <S%G3588><s%> unsettle <S%G387><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> would <S%G609><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> go beyond circumcision <S%G609><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, were called <S%G2564><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> freedom <S%G1657><s%>; only <S%G3440><s%> use not <S%G3361><s%> your freedom <S%G1657><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> an occasion <S%G874><s%> to the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%> be servants <S%G1398><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, even in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3588><s%>: Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself <S%G1438><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye bite <S%G1143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>, take heed <S%G991><s%> that ye be <S%G355><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> consumed <S%G355><s%> one <S%G240><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> another <S%G240><s%>.

But I say <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G1161><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall <S%G5055><s%> not3756, 3361 fulfil <S%G5055><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> lusteth <S%G1937><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>; for <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are contrary <S%G480><s%> the one to the other <S%G240><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G4160><s%> may not <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things <S%G5023><s%> that3739, Leviticus2 ye would <S%G2309><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye are led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, ye are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> these <S%G3430><s%>: fornication <S%G4202><s%>, uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>,

idolatry <S%G1495><s%>, sorcery <S%G5331><s%>, enmities <S%G2189><s%>, strife <S%G2052><s%>, jealousies <S%G2205><s%>, wraths <S%G2372><s%>, factions <S%G2052><s%>, divisions <S%G1370><s%>, parties <S%G139><s%>,

envyings <S%G5355><s%>, <S%G5408><s%> drunkenness <S%G3178><s%>, revellings <S%G2970><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5125><s%> like <S%G3664><s%>; of which <S%G3739><s%> I forewarn <S%G4302><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, even <S%G4302><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I did4277, 2532 forewarn <S%G4277><s%> you <S%G3754><s%>, that they who <S%G3588><s%> practise <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> shall <S%G2816><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, joy <S%G5479><s%>, peace <S%G1515><s%>, longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>, kindness <S%G5544><s%>, goodness <S%G19><s%>, faithfulness <S%G4102><s%>,
meekness <S%G4236><s%>, self-control <S%G1466><s%>; against <S%G2596><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> law <S%G3551><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they that are <S%G3588><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the passions <S%G3804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the lusts thereof <S%G1939><s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> let us <S%G4748><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%>.
Let us <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> vainglorious <S%G2755><s%>, provoking <S%G4292><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>, envying <S%G5354><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.
